articles.description: Foodtech company Swiggy is offering shares at Rs 350 a piece and at a valuation of Rs 80,000 crore ($9.6 billion) valuation.

articles.description: Global goods trade is expected to pick up gradually this year following a contraction in 2023 that was driven by the lingering effects of high energy prices and inflation, WTO economists said in a new forecast on 10 April. The volume of world merchandise trad…
articles.content: In the latest “Global Trade Outlook and Statistics” report, WTO economists note that inflationary pressures are expected to abate this year, allowing real incomes to grow again — particularly in adva… [+7711 chars]

articles.title: India EV market to grow 66% in 2024, may represent one-third of PV sales by 2030 - Mint
